metadata.title: CVE-2020-7106 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti 1.2.8 has stored XSS in data_sources.php, color_templates_item.php,graphs.php, graph_items.php, lib/api_automation.php, user_admin.php, anduser_group_admin.php, as demonstrated by the description parameter indata_sources.php (a raw string from the database that is displayed by$header to trigger the XSS).

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
